column3: Summary
Database subscript function to get DocumentFragment is deprecated
Replace database oriented Factory methods with collection oriented equvalents
UWP deprecated and Xamarin iOS deprecated
Replicator's getPendingDocumentIds() and isDocumentPending(String id) are deprecated
ReplicatorConfiguration's filters and conflict resolver properties are deprecated
ReplicatorConfiguration APIs with Database object are deprecated
MessageEndpointListenerConfiguration APIs using Database object are deprecated
URLEndpointListenerConfiguration APIs using Database object are deprecated
QueryBuilder : isNullOrMissing() and notNullOrMissing() are deprecated
QueryBuilder : FullTextFunction's rank(String index) and match(String index, String query) are deprecated
QueryBuilder : DataSource's database() is deprecated
DocumentChange's database property is deprecated
DatabaseChange and DatabaseChangeListener are deprecated
Database's removeChangeListener() is deprecated
Database's Document APIs are deprecated
Support Scopes and Collections in Kotlin Extensions
Kotlin Configuration Factories to support IndexExpression
Standard naming for Kotlin ConfigurationFactories
Increased security: store BasicAuthenticator password as a char[] and zero before release
The public type ReplicatorConfiguration.ReplicatorType is not visible from Kotlin
ReplicatorConfiguration.setPinnedServerCertificate should take a Certificate
Remove Deprecated ReplicatorConfiguration.ReplicatorType
Improved naming for AbstractReplicatorConfiguration.ReplicatorType
